metadata.title: LemonSpace.io
metadata.description: LemonSpace.io is a platform for creating and managing marketing boards to share on social media.

hero.title: Professional Marketing Boards
hero.description: Create interactive, engaging sales materials without technical knowledge. As simple as PowerPoint, as powerful as a modern web application.
hero.descriptionMobile: Create interactive sales materials without technical knowledge. Simple, professional, measurable.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Builder
dragDrop.description: Create boards with intuitive drag & drop. No technical knowledge required.

mediaLibrary.title: Personal Media Library
mediaLibrary.description: Upload images, videos and documents. Everything securely stored in your own, isolated media library.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track how your customers interact with your boards. Measurable results for better follow-ups.

templates.title: Template System
templates.description: Get started quickly with pre-made templates or create your own for repeated use.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share your boards via personalized links. With password protection and time limits for maximum control.

stats.title: Why LemonSpace?
stats.description: The perfect solution for salespeople who want to create professional sales materials without technical barriers.

pricing.title: Pricing that fits you
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade when you need more features. All plans can be cancelled at any time.

cta.title: Ready to create your first boards?
cta.subtitle: Start for free and create professional marketing boards in minutes.
